lol_highlights_toast_error_save_name: We weren't able to rename your Highlight file. {{message}}
lol_highlights_toast_error_save_name_bad: Sorry, can't rename your Highlight file to have a '{{foundBadChar}}' character. Please enter a name without any of the following characters: {{allBadChars}}
lol_highlights_toast_error_show_in_file_: We weren't able to find your Highlight file '{{filepath}}'. It may not be there anymore.
lol_highlights_delete_dialog_contents: Are you sure you want to delete this Highlight? This cannot be undone.
lol_highlights_default_layout_text_html: Highlights are video clips you make from your Replays. They let you save and relive your biggest moments from League.
lol_highlights_default_layout_subsection: After playing a match, you can download your Replay by clicking this button on the upper right hand side of the End of Game screen. Replays from the current patch can also be downloaded and viewed on the Match History screen. Please note that Replays aren’t recorded for the Co-Op vs. AI games.
After a download, click . Your Replay will launch and you can record Highlights by clicking (or hit CTRL+V) near the Time Controls on bottom of the screen.
You can watch, rename, and delete recorded Highlights on this screen. Clicking shows you where the clips are saved on your computer, so you can share them wherever you want!
lol_highlights_default_layout_warning_co: We can’t find any recorded Highlights.  If you recorded Highlights and recently changed their saved location, you'll need to move them to the new folder.
lol_highlights_highlight_too_large_error:
This Highlight is too large to play in the League of Legends Client.

Try using a video player such as VLC to play this Highlight.
